Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the quality it offers, I believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering the exceptional benefits it provides, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $9500. This special offer is designed to ensure you experience the full value of our product without any compromise on quality or service. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can enhance your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
